name: BLOOD CITY (itch) (NotEvoDev)
description:
Based on one of RageElixir's popular Minecraft role-playing series, Block city, is the horror game Blood City. You'll have to attempt to save a special person in this game. proceeding slowly through each game's characters, including Rage Jr, Amber, and others.

Your objective is to be ready for a terrifying journey in BLOOD CITY. a city that a mysterious man in a mask is in control of. I'm curious about him...

Please be sure you read the instructions after clicking the "New Game" button before beginning. It is quite significant.

Shoutout for Beta-Tester: Raxtus, Quackers, and Smitty.

Suggested PC requirements
- 4 GB Ram.
- 2 GB Space in your files.
- 1920x1080 Screen.
